name: Doodle Club Pro
description:
DOODLE CLUB is a fun game that will ROCK YOUR WORLD.

JOIN THE COMMUNITY -- work with other Doodle Club members to create stories, do collabs, and design new projects

EPIC BATTLES -- Do awesome story, doodle, photo, video, and singing battles with other players in the game

DO AWESOME PROJECTS -- Use your awesome skillz to make fun doodles, stories, flip books, and other projects :)

PLAY AWESOME GAMES -- have fun making competing in doodle of the day, the hourly doodle contest, and many more things

FUN EVENTS -- Each week, enjoy fun new events...like "Dragon Week" where you doodle dragons

START A CLUB -- start a club based on your interests, hold meetings, and pursue new ideas

EXPAND YOUR CREATIVITY -- draw doodles, play games, write stories, create jobs, take photos, and make flip books
